properties.name: dir
properties.description: Sets the direction of the notification. One of "auto", "ltr" or "rtl"

properties.name: lang
properties.description: Sets the language of the notification

properties.name: body
properties.description: Sets the body of the notification

properties.name: tag
properties.description: Sets the identifying tag of the notification

properties.name: icon
properties.description: Sets the icon of the notification
